short_summary: modernize Bridge Inspection Manual and update reporting procedures
description: The Tender Is looking for engineering services to modernize current practices, user-friendliness, and current PSPC reporting procedures
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## EC015-242003 - Bridge Inspection Manual Review

### Tender Details
* **Reference Number:** WS4523321657-Doc4523375013
* **Solicitation Number:** WS4523321657
* **Publication Date:** 2024-04-05
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2024-05-07T14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2024-05-06
* **Expected Contract End Date:** 2026-03-31
* **Procurement Category:** SRV (Services)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective Tendering
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)

### Project Overview
Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) requires heavy civil, bridge engineering, and consulting services to modernize its Bridge Inspection Manual (BIM) to reflect current industry practices and make it user-friendly. The project aims to adopt current PSPC reporting procedures.

### Eligibility and Requirements
This project is aligned with the UNSPSC Code *81100000 - Professional Engineering Services*. Firms must hold a valid Supply Arrangement (SA) EB129-192368 Heavy Civil Engineering Services (Bridge Engineering). The following firms have been invited for the province of New Brunswick:
* Harbourside Engineering Consultants
* R.V. Anderson Associates Ltd
* Hilcon Ltd
* CIMA
* WSP

### Evaluation Criteria
The selection criteria are based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

### Trade Agreements
This project is subject to the following trade agreements:
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)

### Point of Contact
For more information, please contact:
Grant Stewart
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
Email: [stewart.grant@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:stewart.grant@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
Phone: Not Available
Fax: Not Available

### Additional Information
Bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation within 15 working days from receipt of notification that their bid was unsuccessful. Refer to the solicitation for more details.

---

All expansions,
